name: SimonRejzek Official
subtitle: A collection of apps maintained by SimonRejzek
description: This source contains various apps, including ones created by SimonRejzek and others maintained by him. Expect a mix of powerful tools, tweaks, and enhanced apps!

apps.name: uYou Enhanced
apps.subtitle: The ultimate YouTube mod with enhanced features.
apps.versionDescription:
- YouTube v19.08.2.
- Fixed instant crash on video due to iSponsorBlock.
- Fixed weird OLED theme in Shorts.
- Added options to hide the Remix / Clip / Download button under the video player.
apps.localizedDescription:
uYou Enhanced is a modified version of YouTube that includes:
- Ad-blocking
- Background playback
- PiP mode
- Download videos
- Improved speed controls
- No login required

Enjoy YouTube with a better experience!

versions.localizedDescription:
- YouTube v19.08.2.
- Fixed instant crash on video due to iSponsorBlock.
- Fixed weird OLED theme in Shorts.
- Added options to hide the Remix / Clip / Download button under the video player.

- Added experimental ad-blocking improvements.
- Fixed issue with video downloads.
- Minor UI adjustments.

privacy.camera: Used for live streaming and video recording.
privacy.microphone: Required for recording videos and live streaming.
privacy.photoLibrary: Used for uploading videos to YouTube.
privacy.mediaLibrary: Access to saved videos and audio.

apps.localizedDescription: This is an example app created by SimonRejzek. More details coming soon.

versions.localizedDescription: - Initial release of the example app.
